title: Huma Abedin, David Byrne | Summit of All Fears
description:
President Biden spent his Halloweekend shaking hands with the Pope at the Vatican and shaking things up at the UN's Climate Conference in Glasgow. Next, Stephen "Romansplains" the hot new thing in relationships - but DON'T call them that! Huma Abedin chronicles her 25-year career working alongside Hillary Clinton in her new memoir "Both/And," and David Byrne's "American Utopia" is back on Broadway - and so is David Byrne, tonight in the Ed Sullivan Theater!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
